e909903c-49bd-48cc-a40d-12248b2461da.description: This healthcare provider has demonstrated competencies in areas essential to effective care of Warrior Community patients: Military and Veteran culture; cultural biases and barriers to care; Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD); and Traumatic Brain Injuries (TBI). This provider has earned recognition as a Warrior Centric Health Authorized Provider.
e909903c-49bd-48cc-a40d-12248b2461da.name: Warrior Centric Health Authorized Provider: Foundational Bootcamp

alignments.name: Accredited by Advancing Knowledge in Healthcare (AKH) Inc.
alignments.description: AKH Inc., Advancing Knowledge in Healthcare (AKH) is a provider of accredited continuing education for licensed healthcare professionals and has built a reputation for high quality programs that adhere to education and accreditation standards.

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Warrior Centric Health Foundational Bootcamp Course consisting of 4 modules: Military and Veteran Culture in the Clinical Setting, Cultural Competency in the Military and Veteran Communities, Clinical Workshop: Neurobiology of Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder Traumatic Brain Injury Patient and Provider Communication in the Military and Veteran Communities

skills.name: Ability to Overcome Barriers During Encounters with Military/Veteran Patients
Demonstrates Understanding of PTSD/TBI as they relate to the Warrior Community
Effective Communication and Listening with Military and Veteran Warriors
Understanding of Military and Veteran Culture
Understands Cultural Biases/Beliefs in the Warrior Community
